title.rendered: Abode Healthcare names Daniel Schwartz as Chief Operating Officer

content.rendered: Chartwell Partners is pleased to announce the hiring of Daniel Schwartz as the Chief Operating Officer for Abode Healthcare. Abode is a Summit Partners-backed provider of home health and hospice services with in excess of 30 programs spread across 11 states. Mr. Schwartz joins Abode with 30 years experience in the senior care industry which includes serving in key executive positions at Active Day, Almost Family, Inc. and Addus Healthcare, Inc.
